msg: SOLR-1041 -- Make dataDir relative to solr home and instanceDir

author: arkurth
msg: Removed 2 second delay in vcld's loop. It may have caused very rare timing problems with imaging.
Commented out 2 notify() messages in the REAPER() sub. They were only needed for troubleshooting exit status problems.

msg: Set the client system property to control the test case to be run in client or server mode
